2. Anlo anbo layo irinajo wa komewu dani ore - ofe Re lawa rigba o Emi- mimo gbope wa

3. Awa mare alaye okan Baba mimo gbope ewa a o daku, a o yo sonu ninu ijo won o wawati

title: IKOKO OGA OGO
content:
Chrs: Eniti o joko nibi ikoko oga ogo, ni yio ma gbe abeojiji Olodunmare, Ohun kohun to wu ko le de- le de, agbujo le o baba wa, bi aja ba leni lehin – dajudaju yio le pa ikoko o

1. Foya kosi fun Daniel ni ho kinihun t’agbe si, ni toripe o gbadura osi gbekele re le Olorun.

Chrs: Eniti o joko nibi ikoko oga ogo, ni yio ma gbe abeojiji Olodunmare, Ohun kohun to wu ko le de- le de, agbojo le o baba wa, bi aja ba leni lehin – dajudaju yio le pa ikoko o

2. Abdnego at’ egbere ko farapa ninu ina tori angeli Olorun wa pelu won ninu ina na.

Chrs: Eniti o joko nibi ikoko oga ogo, ni yio ma gbe abe ojiji Olodunmare, Ohun kohun to wu ko le de-le de, agbojo le o baba wa, bi aja ba leni lehin – dajudaju yio le pa ikoko o

3. Ileri Olorun nbi fun wa yoso ninu iwe mimo egberun yo subu legbe wa ate gbarun lapa otun sugbon kiyo sunmo odo wa bena ni oro olorun so.

Chrs: Eniti o joko nibi ikoko oga ogo, ni yio ma gbe abeojiji Olodunmare, Ohun kohun to wu ko le de-le de, agbojo le o baba wa, bi aja ba leni lehin – dajudaju yio le pa ikoko o

4. Eyin ara oni gbagbo, esu fe lati dan yin wo, egbadura fun ranlowo, ki gbagbo yin le duro dopin.

He that dwells in the secret place of the most high God, shall abide under the shadow of the most high God.

title: MO TI NI OLUGBALA KAN
content:
Chrs: Ah emi ti ri Olugbala kan ah o femi ah o femi, ah emi tini Olusoaguntan kan ah o femi.

1. Olorun fe araye to be gee tofi fomo re kan soso fun wa enikeni to ba Gbagbo o yio riye.

Chrs: Ah emi ti ri olugbala kan ah o femi ah o femi, ah emi tini Olusoaguntan kan ah o femi.

2. Won de lade egun, won tuto si lara, won fun loti kikan mu o o, nitori emi ati re, emi tini baba agba kan o o, k’ogbowo koto s’egbala mi, emi ti l’ololufe kan ah o femi

Chrs: Ah emi ti ri olugbala kan ah o femi ah o femi, ah emi tini Olusoaguntan kan ah o femi.

3. Nigbati mo sako lo oo, s’ebiwo lope mi wa sagbo nigbati ko s’alabaro mo ah femi, emi ti l’olowori kan oo, moti lalagbawi kan, emi ti l’’ololufe kan ah o femi.

Chrs: Ah emi ti ri olugbala kan ah o femi ah o femi, ah emi tini Olusoaguntan kan ah o femi.

title: ALPHA OMEGA
content:
Alfa, Omega o, o (2ce)

Iwo ni ibere iwo ni opin

Oro re kale, lorun o,

Oro re kale laye

Oro gbenu omo eniyan f’ohun mesaya o

Ohun taba f’oruko e bere o dase

Ase o oba igbala, oro re lase o

Bami o, mo juba o

1. Oba awi ma tase o, asoro maye

Tase- tase, o , ota orun

Bi aso tita

Tase – tase o, o, gbele jade ninu omi

Je koro re le ma gbenu mi o

Kin le se rere, fun mi lagbara

Kinle ba o joba ni kehin

Awa ma ridi ni se re o

Bami o, mo juba o

2. Oba awi ma tase o, a soro ma ye

Iwo lo pase f’ojo o o, ojo yo

Iwo lo pase f’oorun, orun ran

Ona ara ni kogbe temi gba o

Baba bami se o bi wo ba pase ayo

Ire ayo, a te mi lowo,

Awa ma ridi, ni ‘se re o, bami o mo juba o o o o o o o o

title: ORO RE KALE NI ORUN
content:
Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

O ka ‘le ni orun/2x

1. Ni atetekose ni oro ma tiwa eyin ara

Oro na siwa pelu Olorun, Olorun ni oro ‘yen

Oro yi lotun wa pelu Olorun, ni atetekose,

Oro Olorun ye, iyebiyeni

Oro Olorun ye okale ni orun

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

O ka ‘le ni orun /2x

2. Ni atetekose Olorun da orun ohun aye

Aye siwa ni juju, okunkun su b’aye

Nipa oro Olorun, latun f da’ye

Nitori ko so hun to foju han lafi d’ohun t’a nri

Oro Olorun o lomu ohun gbogbo duro

Leyin oro yi kotun sohun miran, taa tun da

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

O ka ‘le ni orun /2x

3. Igbala nbe ninu oro re, odawa lo ju

Iwosan nbe ninu oro re, oye wa yeke/2x

Nigba idamu won, aba atila kosi fun won mo

Won kep’Oluwa, Oluwa ran oro re, osi gba won la ninu iparun/2x

Oro Olorun ye iyebiyeni

Oro Olorun ye okale ni orun

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

Oka ‘le ni orun /2x

4. Ohun gbogbo t’ Oluwa da

Gbogbo re ad’opin, oro olorun o ni kan na laaku, lati se ‘dajo/2x

Koriko nro, itanna sin re patapata

Oro Olorun o nikan laaku lati se ‘dajo

Int: (Oluwa ran oro re)

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

Oka ‘le ni orun /2x

Solo: Osi mu wa larada

All: Osi mu wa larada etc

Chrs: Lai Oluwa oro re o

Oka ‘le ni orun /2x

Kama tanra wajegegebi idele

Kama tanrawa idele onigbagbo

Ko seni tikole sasise, kaya omo

Emi lebi, rawo oko fa mora, ki ile wa ko le toro gege bi omi afowuropon.

Emi o feran re, feran oko mi/ 2x

Ife lokun to sole aye ro

Emi o feranre feran okomi

Se iwo yo feran re, feran ayare/2x

Ife lokun to sole aye ro

Se iwo yo feran re, feran ayare.

Ka; oferan ara wa, feran ara wa/2x

Ife lokun to sole ayero

Kajo feran ara wa, feran ara wa.

title: ALL IN ALL
content:
1. Jesus Lamb of God worthy is your name/2x

You are my strength when I am weak

You are the treasure that I seek

You are my all in all.

2. Seeking you as a precious jewel

But to give up l’d be a fool

You are my all in all.

Refain: Jesus Lamb of God worthy is your name/2x

3. Taken my cross my sin my shame

Rising again I bless your name

You are my all in all.

When I fall down you pick me up

When I am dry you fill my cup

You are my all in all

Refain: Jesus lamb of God worthy is your name/2x

title: BATTLE HYMN OF THE REPUBLIC
content:
Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord.

He is tramping our the vintage where the grapes of wrath are stored

He hath loosed the fateful lightening of His terrible swift sword;

His truth is marching on.

Chorus: Glory, Glory, Halleluya

Glory, Glory, Halleluya

Glory, Glory, Halleluya

His truth is marching on.

2. I have seen him in the watch fires or a hundred circling camps; They have builded Him an alter in the evening dews and damps I can read his righteous sentence by the dim and flaring lamps; His day is marching on. (His day is marching on).

3. He has sounded forth the trumpet that shall never sound retreat; He is sifting out the hearts of men before his judgement seat O be swift, my soul to answer Him, be jubilant, my feet Our God is marching on (our God is marching on).

4. In the beauty of the lilies Christ was born across the sea With a glory in His bosom that transfigures you and me.As He died to make men holy, let us die to make men free tWhile God is marching on (while God is marching on)

title: MAJESTY
content:
Ma-jest –y

Worship His Majesty

Unto Jesus, be all glory honour and praise

Ma-jest –y

Kingdom Authority

Flow from his throne, unto His own

His Anthem raise

So exalt, lift up on high, Christ Jesus the King

Ma –jest-y

Worship His majesty

Jesus who died, now glorified, king of all kings

title: MO DI EDA TUTUN
content:
Chrs: Mo di eda tutun mo deni oto

Ohun atijo ti koja mo di tun

Mo ju asegun lo ninu Jesu

Mo di eda titun mo deni oto

1. Nigbakan ri mo wa ninu ese

Ninu ese ni Jesu kufunmi

Of’ejere ra mi oso mi dotun

O fi Emi mimo re sinu okan mi

2. Awon iwa atijo nito ko sile/3x

Iyato de sinu okan mi.

Chrs: I am a new creature

And brand new man old things are passed awa

Now I am new move then a confront

That’s what I am

I am a new creature

And brand new man

Old things I used to do, I do them no more/3x

There is a great change since I’am born again

Chrs: Sometimes I was in the world wallowing in sin

But Jesus came and set me free

He purge me by His blood and made me clean

There’s a great change since I’m born again.

title: SHOUT WITH JOY
content:
Chorus: Shout with joy (Echo)

All the earth (echo)

Let every tongue shout His praise /3x

Sing the glory of His name

And bow down in wor-ship

1. Give thanks to the Lord

For He’s worthy of our praise

He alone is worthy

To be praised forever more.

2. In the presence of the Lord

There’s full-ness of joy

Sing to God a new song

And praise His Holy name.

3. Whatever you’re passing through

He who carries he weight

Of the world upon His shoulders

He will carry you.

4. Let the joy of the Lord

Be your strength every time.

Sing the glory of His name

And bow down in worship

Chorus: Shout with joy (Echo)

All the earth (echo)

We Let every tongue shout His praise /3x

Sing the glory of His name

And bow down in wor-ship.

title: NIRU AKOKO BI EYI
content:
Intro: In times like this,We need your help Lord,In times like this,In you we put our hopes In times like this /3x

Men: Saviour we need you

Jesus we need you. /3x

Chrs: Niru akoko bi eyi o tohun gbogbo dojuru

Niru akoko bi eyi o o Olorun akowayo/2x

Afi Kolorun ran wa lowo ki amaba ku sona loju onayi, ki amaba gbojege o niria ajo laye (int) ere kini fun enia towa nu aiye tidko si sise tagbe fun o towanse botiwu sugbon kini kan nikoye o boya nitori akokoyi lose wa laye ki o le sise sugbon owo owo lonwa kiri mofe dogun mofe dogbon eyi lo wa dorin re. bi iwo bapa enu re mon gegebi onigbagbo ti o ko sisee na ao gbelelomiran lowo sugbon mofe koranti o pe Esteri kopa enure mo bikobasi ti Esteri oni bi mobasegbe o kinsegbe.

Solo: Niru akoko bi eyi o tota ihinrere nigbile ninu aiye tohun gbogbo siwa dojuru patapata

All: Jowo o Olorun bawa pota ihinrere o lenumo.

Solo: Ani niru akoko bi eyi ti Gbagbo ri ani boseri

All: Afi K’Olorun gbawa o ohun ti gbagbo da komaye ni mo.

Solo: Afi K’Olorun sanu fun wa ohun tigbagboda otoju suni.

All: Ijo tiwonu aiye a aiye ti wonu ijo

Solo: Ohun tikoye katilegbo lagbo igbagbo agbere oyun sise pelu iwa ipa.

All: Oti wa di barakuo ninu ijo Olorun

Solo: Jowo Oluwa funwa lore ofe atojurere la to do re wa

All: Fun wa lagbara baba o lati pa ofin re mo.

title: LAKOKO YI AFE IRANWO RE
content:
Chrs: Lakoko yi afe iranwo re

Lakoko yo wo lole kowayo lakoko yi

1. Lakoko tole afereanwore baba

Iwo sa lole oba wa lakoko yi

2. Ogba eberu meta nimu ina ileru

Odawon lide lakoko tole

3. Awon pe iwo lolorun kashin ti wio ole se

Ninu akoko bi eyi ojowo wa kowayo

4. Ara nimu oluwa mase rorare tin

Ohunkohun towon koledejesu oba o pade

5. Igba tole kipe o sugbon awon to ba le koko awa Sali oleduro titi do pin.

title: AKOKO WO L’AWAYI
content:
Solo: Akoko wo lawa yio to hun gbogbo daru mo araiye loju/2x

All: Oro Iwe lonse, ati bo oluwa losunm’etile /2x

1. Awa gegebi omo-olorun, Jesu fiwa se iriju ninu aiye, nje iwo nsise iriju boti ye nje emi nsise iriju boti ye atide oluwa tisun m’etile…je olotito, Jesu fiwa se iriju ninu aiye (int.)

2. Solo: Asiko wo lawa yio ti gbogbo aiye si sokunkun biribiri

All: Oro iwe mimo lonse, igba ikehin aiye lo de tan

Awa ni ayanfe Olorun, Jesu fi wa se imole ninu aiye. Nje imole re ntan nibi gbogbo nje imole mi ntan nibi gbobo. Tori gbogbo aiye si sokunkun biribiri. Tan imole.. Jesu fi wa se imole ninu aiye

3. Solo: Asiko ti awa yio ese ngbile ninu aiye lojojumo

All: Igba ewu lawa yi o, araiye ko si ninu otito rara.

Sugbon awa omo Olorun, awa ti mo wipe Jesu ni otito, Eje ka lo f’otito yi han fun araiye, ki gbogbo eru ese le di ominira. E je ka lo …. Ki gbogbo eru ese le di ominira.

4. Solo: Opo nkan to sapamo, ti Olorun kofi han fun omo

araiye

All: Opo nkan to ye wa, sugbon to je ajeji si omo araiye.

Awa l’omoloju Olorun, Jesu fi ijinle ijoba orun han fun wa, Oye ka ma rin gegebi omo rere, kale gba kaabo omo odo rere. Ran wa lowo oluwa, kale gba kaabo omo odo rere.

title: IJO JESU
content:
Chrs: Ijo Jesu ijo Jesu o ijo, Jesu feti sile lati gboro sohun Olorun sohun Olorun. Ijo Jesu feti sile lati gboro o ekiyesi ona yin loro Olorun wi (int.)

1. Ninu Jesu ni ayo wa awa timo ninu re ninu re ninu Jesu ni ayo wa awa ti mo o ekiyesi ona yin l’emi olorun wi.

2. Jesu ti fi bukun fun yin lopolopo, bukun yin bukun yin. Eyin si ti ri bukun gba lopolopo o, enyin si ni lati kiyesi ona yin.

3. Jesu ti fi ife nla rara pada, lori gi lori gi osi tun fi ‘fe sowa domo Olorun o, Awa sini lati kiyesi ona wa.

4. Awa simo pe Jesu Kristi npadabo, lojo kan lojo kan. Ejeka mura sile titi dojo na o, awa onigbagbo jeka kiyes’ ona wa

5. Arakunrin arabirin awa npe nyin, pe eke wa gba Jesu; Jesu Krisit nikan ni ona iye o, jowo mase jafara lati to Jesu wa.

title: JESUS KNOCKS
content:
1. Jesus knocks, he calls to thee, weary one, “oh come to me” He can save and only he … open wide the door.

Chrs: O –pen wide the door’ open wide the door’ He can save and only he open wide the door.

2. Jesus knocks; he comes to save, was for thee he life he gave, he halts triumphed o’er the grave open wide the door.

3. Jesus knocks; the moment fly, while salvation yet is near, ere the savior passeth by-open wide the door.

(Awa dupe o 2x Awa dupe o 2x)

Solo: Ijowa, o sori buruku, adupe o

Tenopha –rapha awa dupe

All: Awa dupe o 2x Jeopha –raphe, Awa dupe o

Solo: Ewa bawa jo, ewa bawa yo

Tenopha –rapha awa dupe

All: Awa dupe o 2x Tenopha-rapha, awa dupe o

Solo Lori mama Ajao awa dupe o, Oluwa seun

All: lori mama Bamidele awa dupe o, Oluwa seun

All: lori baba Abayomi o fekuree

Lori yin Ayan fe- olu ni e, Esu kan hun hale lasan nii

You are too young to die now

You are just starting ko sewu (int.)

Change of beat

Solo: Iro lesu npa All: Iro lesu npa o

Solo: Eke lesu nse All;: Eke lesu nse o

Solo: Iro lesu npa All: Iro lesu npa o

Solo: Eke lesu nse All: Eke lesu nse o

Jehopha-rapha is the Lord

Na-so-so, Esu go just de hale mow a

Na-so-so, Esu go just de fa wahala

Satan you are a lair, Satan you are a lair

Amen. Winner oo etc

content:

Fun abo adota odun

Ti wo ti lo dupe

Fun ogun adota odun

Akoja oye awa

Awa mon riri re, awa ma fop e fun o

Ewu lotun losi adupe kobori eyi

Ese messiah Jesu

title: ADUPE
content:
Chrs: Adupe Oluwa fun ojo oni toba walayo Aeope fun o fun ojo oi

to sojuwa ogo iyin loyeo loye o 2x ogo iyin loye foluwa

1. Ose Oluwa tori odawasi afope funo nitori iwo loluwawa gbogbo iyin loye o loye o ogo iyin lo ye foluwa.

2. Oba ti o dawa si ninu ewu gbogbo oba to pawamo ninu ewu, ninu ewu oru ogoiyin loye o loye o ogo iyin loye fun Oluwa.

3. Ninu odun to ko ja iwo lodawa so otun pawamo, odokosi, odayasi odomo si ogo iyin loye o ogo iyin loye fun Oluwa

4. Awa egbe Akorin ijo osere awa sope tori pe apejuse oduneyi ope iyin ye o agbe o ga baba ose ope iyinloye foluwa.

5. Bota ti gbogun to won ko ma bori wa awa madupe tori opelu was ninu gbogbo amuyin wa Olorun ayeraye, baba alagbara ake aleluya is alagbara giga ko fiwa sile ope wa ree, ogo iyin loye fun Oluwa.

title: IKORE TI PON
content:
Ore mi tete wao

Ojonlo mase fi igbalare

Dola ojonlo /2x

Chrs: Ore mi tete wa o jonlo

Ore mi tete wa o jonlo

Ikore ti pon sugbon ko saalagbase

Ore mi tete wa o ojonlo

1. ore me tete wa oo kojo tolo Jesu pe o wipe ki omabo ore mi tete wa o jonlo (int)

2. Ara ninu Oluwa Jesu ni n pe o pe ki omabo, tete wa gba igbala ofe. Chrs.

3. Iku Jesu fun o yio waja sa san bi iku Jesu fun wa yio wa ja sa se bi.

4. Ade lade egun okoo egba fun loti kikan gbogbo iyi yo waja sasan Chrs.

title: CROWD HIM WITH MANY CROWNS
content:
1. Crown him with many crowns. The lamp up – on his throne

Hark! How the heavily an – them downs all – music but it own!

A-wake, my soul, and sing, of him who died for thee

And hail Him as thy match – less king Thro’ all e-ter-nity.

2. Crown Him the Lord of life! Who tri-umphed o’er the grave

Who rose vic-to rious to the strife for those He came to save

His glories now we sing, who died and rose on high

Who died eternal life to bring and lives that death may die.

3. Ede L’ ade pupo Od’aguntan Baba: Gbo bi orin orun ti bo orin gbogbo mole;

Ji okan mi korin T’ eni t’ okun fun o, se l’ oba re to ga julo Titi ati laelae;

4. Crown Him the Lord of Heaven One with the father known

One with the spi-ri-t through Him giv’n form youder glo-rious throne!

To thee be end – less praise for thou, for us has died!

Be thou, o Lord, thro’ end – less days A- dored and magni-f-ied.

title: OGUN ORUN NKORIN
content:
OO, Ojihindeo, O O, Ojihinde O, O O, Ojihinde O O, (Elo)

Elo lowuro kutu – kutu siboji mimo E ori Angeli yi ‘kuta kuro ilekun si

Olugbala ti ji dide o Botiso. |(Int.)

VOCCAL: EGBO OOOOOOOOO

All: Ogun orun nkorin wonkorin Ajihinde, Ogun Orun nkorin

won korin irapada

Solo: Awa eda owo re Jesu Ankorin isegun (All) Jesu ti jinde etc

(Int)

VOCCAL: EGBO OOOOOOOOO (off beat)

Men voice: Ogun korin etc 2x

(BEAT) Solo: Oti ji dide eee

All: Jesu ti ji dide o gbogbo eniyan. Jesu ti ji dide Boji oku sofo.

Solo: ogbosan meta oru meta, ninu Iboji (All) Jesu ti ji dide etc (Int)

VOCCAL: EGBO OOOOOOOOO

All: Ogun orun korin etc 3x.

title: THE OLD RUGGED CROSS
content:
One shill far away stood an old rugged cross

The emblem of suffering and shame

And I love that old cross where the dearest and best for a world of lost sinners was slain.

Chorus: So I’ will cherish the old rugged cross

Till my trophies at last I lay down,

I will cling to the old rugged cross

And exchange it some day for a crown.

2. Oh, that old rugged cross so despised by the world

Has a wonderous attraction for me;

For the dear lamb of God left His Glory above

To bear it to dark calvary.

3. In the old rugged cross, stained with blood so divine

A wondrous beauty I see;

For ‘t was on that old cross Jesus suffered and dired to pardon and sanctify me.

4. To the old rugged cross I will ever be true its shame and reproach gladly bear;

Then he ‘ll call me some day to my home for away,

Where his glory for ever I ‘ll share.

title: E GBE JESU GA
content:
Chorus: Gbe Jesu ga gbogbo eniyan

Eke kabiyesi s’Oluwa

E wole f’oba towa s’ayeyi

Lati wa kun fun gbogbo eniyan

1. Ewa wo oun ti Jesu se owa s’aye lati kunfun wa

O boso ogo re sile ki aw aba segbe si aiye 2x

2. Iwo elese yipada ko bale nipin ‘nu iye yi

Fi gbogbo ewe re sile ko gbe isoro re to Jesu /2x

3. Jesu oba awa yin o, awa wole ni iwaju re

Iyin ogo ati ope l’awa oma fifun o titi /2x

title: E MA SE SUN
content:
Solo: Irewesi ti de o oni Gbagbo kehin solorun /2x

All: irewesi ti de o onigbgbo gbagbe Olorun won

Eniyan nse bose wu won nse fe inu won/2x

1. Akoraye gbo tolorun mo, gbogbo wa nsare owo kiri a o ti seyi si Olorun onigbagbo palanada won sato orisa leyin, won gbagbee Jesu Krisiti eni to ku fun won (int)

title: IYIN YE BABA
content:
Chrs: Iyin ye Baba ye

Atobiju iwo lope ye

Ogo ye Baba o

Eledunmare ope ye o /2x

Solo: Ala adupe All: …..

Lowo Baba o “ “

To o gbawa o “ “

Ninu agbe aiye o “ “

1. Agbara alee le ba ni Baba fi sekewa Agbara abaa leemu lotun fise wa ni oso. Awa derojeje maye lowo inu wa kun fun’ma agabara

Adata koro wonu Jesu, a o maa se mu, fesu mo

Ogo ye Baba o, Eledumare awa sope.

title: DI TITUN O
content:
Chrs.: Di titun o /2x, Kuro niue iwa eri pelu iwa ese gbogbo o,

Agabagebe sise ati iro pipa ako fi Krisiti ko wa bee.

1. Eje ka yi pada si iwa otun, ka gbe igbe aye mimo,

Igbe aye to wo Olorun k’Olorun le fi wa yangan gegebi omo odor ere

Chrs.

2. Nitorina efi eke sise sile, k’olokuluku yin ba omo enikeje re so otito

Ninu ohun gbogbo nitori eya omo’enikeji wa li awa nse/2x

Chrs.

3. Ni’ibi iro pipa, iru eko wo lafe ko nibi eke sise, iro eko wo lafe ko agabagbe ko lere, iparun o lo nmu bani

Chrs.

4. Emase je ki oro idibaje kan tie nu yin jade sugbon iru eyi t’ odara fun eko (ki ole mafi ore ofe fun awon eniti ongboo/2x)

Chrs.

5. Gbogbo iwa ki koro ati ibinu, irunu, ariwo ati oro buburu ni ki amu kuro lodo yin, pelu gbogbo arakan.

title: WA SANU FUN MI
content:
Chrs: Wa saanu fun mi o, saanu fun mi ooo Oluwa

Wa sanu fun mi o Jise re dide o laye mi/2x

1. Oluwa mu ki ise re soji ninu aye mi o

Ogona ara damilola Olorun mi/2x

Chrs.

2. Eni ma daso f’eniyan sebi torun re la wo baba,

Aye ti mo mi moo, jeki won ri ewa re ka lara mi/2x

Chrs.

3. iwo ni Olorun kos’ ohunti, wa se temi lasepe,

Iwo tun lonise iyanu, wa yanmi lenu Jesu nipa agbara isoji re,

M’aye mi bo sipo Olorun mi/2x

Chrs:

4. Sanu mi/2x so ise re di mimo laye mi, sanu mi / 2x fogo re han lara me,

Sanu mi Olodumare sanu mi o baba, sanu mi Olorun mi, fanu han fun

Mi o lakoko mi, ninu ibinu re o ranti anyu re o lori mi

title: ALAFIA MI NI MO FIFUN YIN
content:
Chrs: Alafia mi ni mo fifun yin

Kii ma ise bi aye ti fifun ni/2x

1. Mo fun yin l’alafia mi egba o, kii ma ise gege bi aye ti fifun ni,

Ni emi fifun yin egba Alafia mi o, emi ni mo fifun yin.

Chrs:

2. Bi santani ba fun o l’ewure, malu ni yo fi gba

Jesu nikan lafun ni ma s’iregun o, Alafia Jesu l’opeuye

Chrs:

3. Aye le fun o ni fila ki wo gb’ ori lowo re,

Aye tun le fun o ni bata ki won gb’ese re lo

Aye tun le fun ni ago iyebiye oo ki won o gb’owo re lo

Simi le Jesu oun nikan l’Olorun Alafia, yio fifun o lopolopo o.

Chrs.

title: IDA PADA INI
content:
Chrs: Ini mi da obaba file mi lowo eyi taye ti gbe gbawon padafun mi Olorun ma o oba sanufun mi (Int)

1. Ini mi ti ati gbalatinu oyunwa oba gba won pada eyi ti ati gba nigba ti mo dele aye ten olorun gba won fun mi,

2. Irina jo kerekere ken leyi o e teti gbowa iri ajo yile (ole 3x) ole ole ole o Olorun niken lole gbani gbigba inire pada Olorun niken loto gba ni.

Chrs.

3. Loju irin ajoye won koeruloti lo abramu lalo fun eyi oni patara won ba gba inire pada won keru owon ko omo inire ti ote gba Emimimo agba won fun o oruko Jesu Krisiti Olorun o ako oyo.

Chrs:

4. Orisisi ini lobe tire yato si temi, temi yato sitire Olorun tose ti Mordecai ki wa loku tiko tun lese iwo sa to Jesu wa akuba oseti rechers.

5. Ki lape ni ini genge eyi nise eto re arakurin ken bee ninu Bibeli o ini re. loba gba lo eyi tise iyawo re, sugbon Olorun sise iyanu oba Abimelekii olorun lile ye soro osifi ini re sile (nitori ti toluwa ni)

Chrs:

6. Lape la o so o ani nipa tire loruko Jesu Oluwa awon inire tiati gba o odo won pade fun o gege bi tomo isire ii igba ten gba apon ti erilo lowo awon omo Israeli ida pada apoti eri ye olen awon ota won lopoo nikan inire ti ati gba ota re atun je bi

Chrs: ……..(lape o lajina ayo mi ferede).

title: ILERI OLORUN
content:
Chrs: Ileri re ladimu o (ileri o) ileri re Ladimu baba ileri ti kiye ileri re ladimu o olorun ayo oba tiki damaje mu (Int.)

1. Ara ileri Olorun se bi ohun leyi o pea won to duro d’Oluwa a o tun agbara won se eyi laduro de koje kale se bi aye ti u se baba sanu fun wa ileri re ladi mu.

2. C.R.PC omo lojure laje o, mase je koju tiwa o Olorun ayao (Baba 2x) agba mase je, ja sa se o ti o muwa dele o, kamase kusona.

3. Eto re fun wa o, Olorun jowo wamuse, aye ti mo wa o, a ofe se die pada o, ani kaye gbowa o, kakiri agba yeo, wipe ijo ikan un bee o, ta npe ni Christ Restoration, taba gbo wa laye o, katun rira ologo, Olorun wa te waju o.

4. Awon Olori wa, Olorun sanu fun won, gbogbo isoro won o olorun muri Olorun satunse awon wori kan mase je ohun idena fun se won, olori aye o, dakun diwon mu dopin.

title: JERUSALEM T’ORUN
content:
Prelude: Jerusalemu t’orun

Ni be ni okan me fe lo /2x

Chrs: Jerusa: sa lemu, niti t’awon mimo, nko ‘rin halleluyah nibe

ni mo fe lo. /2x

1. Ile to dara – ile ologo – ile aiyeraiye (Ile) tese kosi – iwo hamura lati de ‘le na, iwo ore mi roun o.

Chrs:

2. Ile didan o – ile aiku ni, f’awon t’ba segun (Tiwon) yo ko ‘rin ayo, iwo ha mura lati wo ‘le ma; arakunri ronu wa.

Chrs:

3. Nibi t’ ade wa – Ade to dara, yato s’ade aiye (Tolo) wo ko le rira

Tao fi fawon to ba segun lofe, Arabirin ronu wo.

Chrs:

4. Nibiti aro – ‘banuje ko si, Orin ayo titi (Nibi) t’ ekun ko si

Iwa re yo je ko le de ‘le na; iwo ore me ronu o.

Chrs:

5. Jesu silekun – on duro de o, on pe o jeje pe (wipe)

Wa ba mi kalo jowo ore me tete gbo ‘pe na; kilekun na to ti

Chrs:.

title: OSE JESU OLORE
content:
Chrs: Titobi nio Olorun awa titobi nio atileyin funwa agbeoga o opo togbayewaro ose o Jesu olore.

1. Iwo lopeye olorun awon omo ogun, oloreo ijinle abubare ajekayeyowa ijore komatuka o, ase o loba Jesu olore.

Chrs.

2. Adupe fowo agbara to fin sise iyanu angbadura be lonfesi ayo, ikoko bububru kowagbo ijore, iwo loto o latigba gbogbo yin.

Chrs.

3. Iwo losowipe, wako ijore, olenu ipo oku, o koye borire, eyilomuse funwa, latodun mewa yiwa, babiyesire atobajaye.

Chrs.

4. Agbe ebinizeri wa soke si o baba, gbobo ijo CRPC lonsope oseo, adupe ore aoyabara moreje ake aleluyah soba atobijulo

title: VICTORY ALL THE TIME
content:
1. They who know the Savior, shall in Him be strong

Mighty in the conflict of the right ‘gainst wrong

This the blessed promise given in Gods, word, doing wondrous exploits, they who know the Lord.

Chrs: Victory, Victory, Blessed blood-brought victory

Victory, victory victory all the time

As Jehovah liveth, strength divine He giveth unto those who know him victory all the time

2. In the midst of battle do not be dismayed,

Though the powers of darkness against thee arrayed

God thy strength is with thee, causing thee to stand heavens allied armies wait at thy command

3. Brave to bear live’s testing, strong the foe to meet

Working like a hero midst the furnace heat

Doing wondrous exploits with spirit sword.

Winning soul for Jesus praise praise the Lord.

ISEGUN LOJOJUMO

1. Awon to molorun yio my okan le

Nwon ojalagbara li oju ija

Eyi n’ileri ti oluwa se fun wa

Pe a o ma se ise agbara nla

Chrs.: Isegun, isegun

Isegun ta feje ra

Isegun isegun ni ojojumo

Jesu Balogun wa, agbara wa kiyo ye

Je ka gbekele fun isegun lojojo

2. Larin wa ha la nla mase se Gbagbo

Bagbara okunkun tile n de si o

Jesu Alagbara yio mu o duro

Yio ran ogun orun lati gbeja re

3. Je alagbara, si kojuja s iota

Ma yan bi asegun inu ina idawo

Fi ida emi re sise agbara

Fa elomiran wa si yin Oluwa.
